english.segment1: Come let us return to the Lord, . come let us return to the Lord. Fill this room with sound, let the praise resound. Come let us return to the Lord
english.segment2: Gloria, gloria, Lord our eyes are fixed upon you. Gloria, gloria, turn our hearts to you again
english.segment3: Welcomed to the table of the King, Welcomed to the table of the King. Homeless and ashamed, the Saviour called our names. We've been welcomed to the table of the king
english.segment4: Gloria, gloria, Lord our eyes are fixed upon you. Gloria, gloria, turn our hearts to you again
english.segment5: Look what you've done, look what you've done. all that we have is yours alone. what can we give, what can we bring. you deserve more than the songs that we sing
english.segment6: Let mercy rise like praise to your throne, Let mercy rise like praise to you throne. Father touch your church, 'til justice fills the earth. Let mercy rise like praise to your throne
english.segment7: Gloria, gloria, Lord our eyes are fixed upon you. Gloria, gloria, turn our hearts to you again
